# Credentials Format

## Algorithmia

File: `algorithmia.json`

```
{
    "apiKey":"simx2RioJHYdUypR9zu4dma/32w01s"
}
```

## Watson-NLU - Natural Language Understanding
```
{
  "apikey": "deGxeEvIpbox6oULCKdrZ9jheCCDGEjq940dlULA895Fd",
  "iam_apikey_description": "Auto generated apikey during resource-key operation for Instance - crn:v1:bluemix:public:natural-language-understanding:us-south:a/7d6e85c190bc4f3ba7f34e4e1120a66f:3a1b53b8-a47f-487d-8bf0-23ed846a9a74::",
  "iam_apikey_name": "auto-generated-apikey-9b10c37a-1564-4c8d-b017-deaca56062b4d",
  "iam_role_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam::::serviceRole:Manager",
  "iam_serviceid_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam-identity::a/7d6e85c190bc4f3ba7f34e4e1120a66f::serviceid:ServiceId-6bd03f1a-f6dc-42a8-a585-0d096794187bd",
  "url": "https://gateway.watsonplatform.net/natural-language-understanding/api"
}
```
